timeout set to 3 seconds
send (AT&F&C1&D2^M)
expect (OK)
^M
OK
 -- got it

send (AT+CMGF=1^M)
expect (OK)
^M
^M
OK
 -- got it

send (AT+CUSD=1,*124#,15^M)
expect (xx)
^M
^M
OK^M
